name: .HMS File Extension
summary: Learn about .HMS files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Contains commands that can be run within HostMonitor, a server monitoring program; formatted as a text file with one command per line; commands are case insensitive, while parameters are case sensitive; comments begin with a semicolon.

content: HMS files typically reference corresponding TestList (.HML) files. Examples of HostMonitor commands include "NewTestList," "LoadTestList," "AppendTestList," "ImportFromFile," and "SaveTestList."

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
